parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.12

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>serverExec</name>=<value> server

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sides

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Multiplayer

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Adds side score. This is shown in the MP score tab as the total score. MP Only. Server execution only.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> side '''addScoreSide''' value

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value>  side: [[Side]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value>  value: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[west]] [[addScoreSide]] 10;</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[score]], [[addScore]], [[scoreSide]], [[getPlayerScores]]

</value></part><part><name>mp</name>=<value> Server execution only
</value></part></template></root>
